title: Task 93

question.text: What does it mean when all the team members have a chance to speak?

answers.answer: Everyone has the opportunity to express their thoughts.
Only certain members are allowed to talk.
answers.feedback: Chance here means the possibility for everyone, not just select individuals.

answers.answer: Team members can speak whenever they want, without order.
answers.feedback: While everyone has a chance, it is implied that there is an order in the context of a meeting.

answers.answer: No one is allowed to speak during the meeting.
answers.feedback: The statement clearly says that all members have the opportunity, so it cannot mean that no one can speak.

dialogue.text: Absolutely. All the team members have a chance to speak

description: The phrase have a chance to speak implies that everyone is given the opportunity to contribute to the conversation.
